column4: Will the "sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop" ruin any configurations or installes software on a ubuntu servermachine?
its more secure to not run an x server
: I know, thats why I didn't use X on it while I was admin, now I quit that job and they want me to install an X so that someone else can manage the server in ways of moving files around etc
you could install a vnc server so they can log in graphically via vnc but there will only be a virtual x server while they are logged in
